Articles.Content:
What a fun game! Well, of course, I haven't actually started playing yet, but I will.

Is there anything fun I should try doing right off the bat, or is the career mode pretty awesome for getting started?

This is the sort of philosophical problem you can only answer for yourself. Try it and see.

And welcome to the forum.

What a fun game! Well, of course, I haven't actually started playing yet, but I will.

Is there anything fun I should try doing right off the bat, or is the career mode pretty awesome for getting started?

Career mode is a great way to ease into the parts, but it really depends on what you want to do. If you want to launch massive rockets with tons of boosters, career mode won't get you there right away.

I definitely recommend the tutorial missions though.
Career mode is definitely a good start, but if you don't know the basics of orbital mechanics you aren't going to get very far...

Hi! Welcome aboard!

I recommend watching some tutorials on Youtube and to be more specific, Scott Manley's tutorials.

Happy launching!
